start.text: You can't quite remember how you got here, but you've woken up on what looks like a boat. What do you do?

choices.text: assume you are the captain and take control

boat_fire.text: The boat is on fire, this is pretty bad. What do you want to do next?

choices.text: head to the galley for a snack

look_for_snack.text: You head down to the galley for a snack, but the galley is on fire and now you're trapped. You're probably not going to find any treasure today

overboard.text: You're overboard now - there are sharks and the odd explosion. Things aren't looking very good. Perhaps you shouldn't have set fire to the boat. No treasure today.

captain.text: Great. You're the captain now! Nice Hat. Where do you want to sail this boat to?

go_north.text: It's way too cold here - you hit an iceberg and your boat explodes. No treasure for you today

go_south.text: After two hours you reach an island, the island is full of treasure, it's all yours, you've won! You're great. Everyone thinks you're awesome.
